REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F f3690 reute r f BC-vulcan-packaging 03-16 0053

TEXT.TITLE: VULCAN PACKAGING <VIPLF> SETS ISSUER BID
TEXT.BODY: Vulcan Packaging Inc said it received regulatory approval for a normal course issuer bid, allowing the company to acquire for cancellation up to five pct of outstanding common shares on the Toronto Stock Exchange between April 24, 1987 and April 23, 1988. Reuter
